page.title: 18WESTHOUGHTON TODAY
page.content: In Westhoughton today there are lots of things to do but not many special places to visit. There are many shops and some of these belong to a {chain}like Greenhalghs,Waterfields,and Diamond Discount.This means that the chain has other shops in nearby towns. Some of the shops are{family-owned} like Tinniswoods,Mark Brown's,and Sam Aldred's.These shops were set up by one generation of the family and have been taken on by the son or daughter. They will probably be continued by a child of the present owner. There are a few{restaurants},such as Casa Nostra,The Courtyard,and The Mercury Motel.There are many{public {houses}(pubs),such as The Loose Goose, The Red Lion,The Wheatsheaf,The White Lion,The Greyhound,The Waggon and Horses,The Rose and Crown.
